body_html:
@martinwicke Sorry, I have introduced a bug when I eliminate result variable in _should_add_regularizer, which leads to CI build test failed. I missed return True when all checks have passed after for loop. The bug has been fixed. I also refine the code to limit to 80 columes.

Thanks for your review and another CI build test should be triggered.
body_text:
@martinwicke Sorry, I have introduced a bug when I eliminate result variable in _should_add_regularizer,  which leads to CI build test failed. I missed return True when all checks have passed after for loop.  The bug has been fixed.  I also refine the code to limit to 80 columes.
Thanks for your review and another CI build test should be triggered.
body:
@martinwicke Sorry, I have introduced a bug when I eliminate `result` variable in `_should_add_regularizer`,  which leads to CI build test failed. I missed `return True` when all checks have passed after `for` loop.  The bug has been fixed.  I also refine the code to limit to 80 columes. 

Thanks for your review and another CI build test should be triggered.
